entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
